meaningMnemonic: On the <radical>scooter</radical> is an <radical>insect</radical> and a <radical>bear</radical>. The bear immediately stomps the insect, squishing it flat. "My god, the insect is smashed. Someone call <kanji>dispatch</kanji>!"
readingMnemonic: Out of the <kanji>dispatch</kanji>ed ambulance jumps <reading>Ken</reading> (けん) the samurai. "Dispatch sent me! I'm here to fix that insect."
